summary: Rabbit, a country-born trickster, takes over the organized crime racket in Harlem, facing opposition from the institutionalized racism of the Mafia and corrupt police.
cast: Barry White|Charles Gordone|Scatman Crothers|Philip Michael Thomas|Danny Rees|Buddy Douglas|Jim Moore|Ralph Bakshi|Frank DeKova|Ben Gage|Al Lewis|Mihaly 'Michu' Meszaros|Richard Paul
keywords: blaxploitation|psychedelic image|grindhouse film|murder of a police officer|psychotronic film
title: Coonskin
